Class Account

Account
Direct Known Subclasses:
Checking, MoneyMarket, Savings

extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account​(Profile holder, double balance, Date dateOpen)
      Initializes the Account object
      Parameters:
      holder - - the profile object that represents a person opening an account
      balance - - the amount that the person initially deposits into the bank
      dateOpen - - the date when the account is being opened

  • Method Details

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance()
      This function returns the balance in this account
      Returns:
      the balance of the account

    • setBalance

      public void setBalance​(double balance)
      This function adjusts/changes the amount money in the account
      Parameters:
      balance - - the new balance that the account should have

    • getHolder

      public Profile getHolder()
      a getter method to get the person who holds/owns this bank account
      Returns:
      the profile object

    • getDateOpen

      public Date getDateOpen()
      getter method to get the date when the account was opened
      Returns:
      the date on which the account was opened

    • debit

      public void debit​(double amount)
      This method decreases the balance in this account by the specified amount
      Parameters:
      amount - - the amount that needs to be debited from the account

    • credit

      public void credit​(double amount)
      This method increases the balance in this account by the specified amount
      Parameters:
      amount - - the amount that needs to be credited into this account

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Account account)
      Checks if the account in the argument is the same as this account, that is the same person holds both the account
      Parameters:
      account - - the account that needs to be compared with this account
      Returns:
      - true if the accounts are same, false otherwise

    • monthlyInterest

      public abstract double monthlyInterest()
      abstract method that returns the monthly interest according to account type
      Returns:
      - the monthly interest that the account holder receives

    • monthlyFee

      public abstract double monthlyFee()
      abstract method that returns the monthly fee according to account type
      Returns:
      - the fee that the account holder pays
